Room.Name: Nyyron Creek
Room.ShortDescription: You are wading in the Nyrron Creek as it flows from north to southwest.
Room.LongDescription: As you look up to the mountain on the east side, you see where an avalanch of dirt and boulders has covered the trail which used to traverse the mountain. A little to the northeast the creek spills over the debris, forming a small waterfall about three meters in height. South of you is the Nyyron Trail which continues down the mountain.
